mapper.select: select * from ( select rownum rnum, a.id, a.announcement_title, a.announcement_content, a.announcement_url, b.admin_name as admin_name, a.announcement_date, a.announcement_important from announcement a, admin b where a.admin_id = b.id order by a.announcement_important desc, a.id asc ) where rnum between 1 and 5
